data.title: Gravity Falls/BillDip
data.meta_description: Read stories about #alternateuniverses, #bill, and #billcipher on Wattpad, recommended by yoielovesstories
data.text:
Bill Cipher's Son

Bill wanted someone to care for and share his knowledge with, just between the two of them. But Bill never wanted a lover, being a demon was an advantage because they were a mix of both genders. Then when it's almost time for the baby to come, Stanford enters and banishes Bill into a deep place into the mindscape. Aft...

Completed

Importance of a PineTree [Billdip]

The PineTree in the zodiac is the most important symbol to Bill Cipher's Wheel. The other zodiac symbols on his Summoning Wheel also represent people and memories as well, but not as important as the PineTree. [BillDip] don't like? don't read! I don't own Gravity Falls, but I do own the Au I hope I made up. All rights...

Completed

Gravity Fails

Dipper had disappeared the day Weirdmageddon went global. Countries burned down, millions killed, and thousands joining the Falls Rebel Cause. All because Dipper Pines wanted to keep his family safe. __ I DO NOT OWN GRAVITY FALLS OR ANY OF IT'S CHARACTERS OR SETTINGS OR PICTURES AND VIDEOS POSTED. _ Also, this is Bil...

Completed Mature

Welcome to the Deep End [An AU BillDip]

Known all over the lands for his infamous piracy, and vast riches, he and his crew venture into the deep ends of the ocean with high hopes, and heavy burdens. "Heave 'er up!" the raspy voice shouted, a single gold tooth flashing among the crew mates pearly whites. The pulley strained at the sudden weight, slowly wheel...

My World Now

Bill Cipher has finally done it. He has take over the world and no one can stop him. Bill is king to this new world that he will shape in to his world, with his new queen Dipper Pines by his side. He's sending his demon slaves and hellhounds out to kill everyone one who dare messes will his new plans. - - - Sexual t...

Completed Mature

Off the Deep End

"It was at the beginning of summer 1732 however, that Captain Pines overheard the Tent of Telepathy's deck cadet rant about lost treasure in Mindscape Bay. The boy talked and talked and honestly, Pines had long since tuned him out – lost treasure, yeah right! But when he heard the word 'siren' being spoken, he immedia...

Mature

Cipher's Kingdom (Billdip~)

Bill Cipher is the king and is looking for a queen so he can have a child. One women in each household has to come to the kingdom Ball so they can meet with the king. Dipper decides to go in the place of his twin sister Mabel thinking if he just stays hidden Cipher won't choose him, but the wicked king has other plans...

Unexpected Game (Billdip)

[Going under cleaning] Weirdmageddon is happening, but something is different. Has Bill really won the game? Is the world finally under Bill's reign? What if Dipper didn't decide to try and punch Bill when he was being pressured by the jerk of a triangle to do something to stop him. Instead Dipper did something unexpe...

Completed

Alone in the Rut

When Dipper gets tired of Mabel's constant singing and obnoxious yelling at him, he decided to take a nice break in his favorite clearing in the woods. But of course, he was at the wrong angle, at the wrong time.

BillDip - End of a Beginning

The end of the world is here, much quicker than Dipper Pines ever thought it would be, and he's not prepared. He's helplessly alone until a certain triangle comes to visit him in this grim time.

Outsiders (Billdip)

It's been 4 years since twin siblings Dipper and Mabel visited Gravity falls for the first time and they are returning for the summer once more. Although Mabel is incredibly excited to see their Grunkles, Stan and Ford, Dipper is troubled by other teenage dilemmas and feels more alone than ever. He has nobody to turn...

Grand Hierarchy

When the Pines sent their two children, much rather teens growing into adults actually, to the mysterious town of GravityFalls once more for a longer period of time than usual, Dipper Pines finds himself face to face with not only the mythical creatures and indescribable nightmares, but with a certain triangular creat...

Sweater Weather~BillDip fanfiction (BoyxBoy) UNDER CONSTRUCTION

Autumn, Fall, Harvest, whatever you want to call it. Leaves falling, pumpkin spice in the air, but most importantly... it is now Sweater Weather. Bill Cipher, the owner of the local coffee shop sensation "Koffee Kid?" has got his hands full during the fall time. He's settled down from his destructive past and has fina...

Mature

Dipper's guide to the unexplained #666: Bill Cipher (BoyxBoy)

Dipper and Mabel's 20th birthday, when someone uninvited shows up, Bill Cipher. Although unexpected the first time, he's invited to stay the rest... Warning: explicit at some times

Completed Mature

Dancing In The Dreamscape (BillDip)

Still in Gravity Falls Dipper Pines finds himself wondering around the forest. But what he doesn't know is that an unexpected visit will soon came to pass. *contains explicit language* Note: I will not be writing lemon or smut. Thank you.

Completed

Roommates - BillDip Fanfic

Made by popular demand, the continuation of my Roommates one shot! A college AU where Dipper and Bill get paired up as roommates. as cliche as it sounds, you guys wanted a full fanfiction, so here goes nothing.

Completed

Love Story (Billdip): A Gravity Falls Fan Fiction Story

Dipper finally relives who he really is and loves it! (This is Billdip so if you don't like, don't read)

How to Burn a Pine Tree (Discontinued)

This story is discontinued but feel free to go through and read/reread Furious by his defeat, Bill Cipher wonders how to get his revenge on Dipper, and now that Dipper just went back home, that seems unlikely... But when an unlikely idea pops in his head, how far will he go to get his revenge? Back home, Dipper finds...

Completed

Bill x Dipper (gravity falls)

YAOI MAN ON MAN DON'T LIKE DON'T READ This is a fan fiction of my own. i have been meaning to write this for a while but it the time i didn't have a wattpad.

BILLDIP (Pine tree is mine)

Hello there yaoi lovers this is my first yaoi BILLDIP fanfiction and I love this ship so why not make a story about them. well enjoy~♡

These Chains [DISCONTINUED]

After eight years, twins Dipper and Mabel Pines have finally returned to Gravity Falls to spend another summer with their Grunkle Stan. But something isn't quite right. Dipper has been having horrible nightmare and terrifying visions that he can't quite explain. He doesn't know what's wrong, but it might have somethin...
